Welcome to pdf-diff-compare tool’s documentation!¶

PDF Difference comparison tool is a tool to compare two input pdf files , and compared text content in it. It takes an excel file as input which contains columns with new and old files, Tool does a textual comparison of the file and out the data to an excel file (output.xlsx).
